content: The block 2.2 configuration was designed to be much more capable compared to block 2.0 and includes improvements such as a modular payload bay that allows us to swap customer payload capability for additional propellant to enable longer duration missions, a more efficient structural design and enhanced payload hosting capabilities and our next generation Microwave Electro thermal Thruster or MET which is designed to be more capable than its predecessor that flew on Vigoride 3.
